dmca.title: [TEMPORARILY REMOVED AT SUBMITTER'S REQUEST] Investing in Another's Mark?
dmca.body: This office represents Investor's Business Daily, Inc. and certain of its affiliates (collectively "IBD"). IBD is the owner of all right, title and interest in and to trademarks and service marks including: "CAN SLIM," "IBD," "Investor's Business Daily," and "Investors.com" in various forms, and in connection with a host of goods and services sold both domestically and abroad (collectively the "Marks"), along with proprietary copyright and trademark rights in the names and character likenesses of the Marks. IBD is also the exclusive, worldwide owner of all rights and copyrights associated with the articles, graphs, and data created and published in Investor's Business Daily
